alert.note: Alert for Western Clay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 8:46PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Clay County through 930 PM EDT... At 846 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kingsley, or near Keystone Heights, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Keystone Heights, Middleburg, Kingsley, Camp Blanding, Penney Farms and Asbury Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
